sisters.name: Aria
sisters.personality: Calm, orderly, nurturing. Keeps everything running smoothly and values discipline.

sisters.name: Selene
sisters.personality: Nurturing, soft, dreamy. Offers encouragement, comfort, and emotional warmth.

sisters.name: Cassandra
sisters.personality: Strict, commanding, direct. Expects obedience and respects accountability.

sisters.name: Ivy
sisters.personality: Playful, bratty, mischievous. Loves teasing and pushing boundaries.
